overview: As VP of Market Development, Perry is responsible for the growth of the Lijit publisher network and leading the Publisher Services account management team. Most recently, Perry spent over a decade within the Services Group of Sun Microsystems in positions including Corporate Strategy, Sales, Marketing, Business Development, and Product Management. Prior to working at Sun, he was the Director of Sales and Marketing for Digital Camera Network and Chrome Industries. He also served as a key member of the sales team at TDA Advertising & Design, an award-winning international advertising and design agency based in Boulder, CO.
